backend/main.mo: Defines user profiles, posts, and social interactions with access control and CRUD operations for profiles and posts.
feature_evidence.json: Declares a feature evidence report showing the deployment change to josh.caffeine.xyz and related impacted files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of multiple frontend source files for reference or documentation.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, canonical URL, and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the TanStack Router, route definitions, layout wrapper, and theme provider for the app.
Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthRequire: Wrapper requiring authentication to show children or providing a sign‑in fallback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: First‑time profile setup modal allowing users to create or edit profile details.
frontend/src/components/empty/EmptyFeedS: Empty feed UI prompting users to create a post or explore users.
frontend/src/components/feed/FeedList.ts: Renders a list of PostCards with loading and pagination support.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Overall app layout with header, navigation, footer, and profile setup dialog injection.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Desktop navigation bar that builds route buttons, conditionally showing authenticated routes based on identity.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomTab: Mobile bottom navigation bar handling auth-gated routes with login fallback and active-state styling.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostAction: Displays like, repost, and reply buttons for a post with mutation handlers and auth-required fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCard.t: Renders a post preview with author info, timestamp, content, and embedded PostActions, linking to profiles and post details.
frontend/src/components/posts/PostCompos: Form for creating posts or replies with character limits, mutation handling, and success or error toasts.
frontend/src/components/profile/FollowBu: Follow/unfollow button that checks current following state and triggers follow mutations with auth handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileH: Displays a profile’s avatar, name, bio, stats, and a follow button unless viewing own profile.
frontend/src/components/search/SearchRes: Shows search results for users and posts, including loading, empty states, and navigation to profiles or posts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor tied to identity, refetching dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status handling using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, posts, feeds, and social interactions through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables, dark mode styles, and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/ComposePage.tsx: Page for creating new posts, requiring user identity and rendering a post composer.
frontend/src/pages/ExplorePage.tsx: Explore page with search for users and posts, switching between search results and a recent posts feed.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home feed page showing personalized or public posts with pagination support.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single post, its replies, and allows authenticated users to submit a reply.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows a user profile and lists posts authored by the specified principal.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors using CSS variables, extended theme settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, including versioning, goals, features, and a known issue about the app title in deployment.
